name: MAKAFUKA feat.PARED (Camellia Remix)
description: I'm a bit unclear as to what this song actually is but here is what I have gathered. Gran Saga is and MMORPG that used RAD WIMPS's song MAKAFUKA in some of their promotional material. Since then the artist PARED has released a cover of MAKAFUKA that was remixed by Camellia. In addition, kradness and くろくも also released covers of MAKAFUKA, remixed by lapix and MK respectively and 松下 released a cover of a rearranged version of MAKAFUKA by 大和. Based on the descriptions of these songs they seem to be promoting Gran Saga and a tweet by Gran Saga appears to confirm that these were commisioned by them. All of these were initially released as special MVs in November 2021, each around three and a half minutes in length. In December PARED, くろくも, and 松下 released full versions of their covers which were around 5-6 minutes. I have not been able to find a full version from kradness.
